sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="x_sthc_testing_sui_test_step"> <x_sthc_testing_sui_test_step action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <applicaiton>Beacon</applicaiton> <assignment_group/> <detailed_description/> <expected_result/> <number>TS0003644</number> <order>129</order> <prep_step>false</prep_step> <state>draft</state> <sys_created_by>RBUSCH</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-07-19 21:24:52</sys_created_on> <sys_id>5cb3e51bdbdf5b0040f8fcfa0c96197f</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>RBUSCH</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-07-19 21:24:52</sys_updated_on> <test>Add a second therapy plan for Gamunex -- Click edit plan in existing plan, in actions dropdown click + protocol, select Immune Globulin (Gamunex), assign plan, address any hard stops (select interval of weekly, every 1 week, any day, 1 time per week; select dose of 400 mg/kg; select an indication)</test> <test_script display_value="TES0001019">bd8fd1d3dbdf5b0040f8fcfa0c961988</test_script> <testing_user>BCNRNCB</testing_user> </x_sthc_testing_sui_test_step> </record_update>
